headline: Taking a Fresh Look at Amphenol (APH) Valuation After Record Q3 Earnings, AI Growth and Dividend Hike
summary: Amphenol (APH) just turned in a record third quarter, with sales jumping 53% and adjusted earnings up 86%, powered by AI data center demand and acquisitions. The company also hiked its dividend and raised 2025 guidance. See our latest analysis for Amphenol. Despite a small pullback around the latest print, Amphenol’s momentum is still impressive, with the share price up roughly 101% year to date and a five year total shareholder return of about 335%, signaling sustained confidence in its AI...
